tool.name: Simulate paired-end reads

param.name: opt_selector
param.label: Would you like to set additional parameters?

param.name: num
param.label: Number of reads to simulate for each perfect match score
param.help: Non-perfect match scores will be scaled using "Minimum primer matching score" parameter. Default: 1000

param.name: bed_selector
param.label: Would you like to specify a BED file?
param.help: Used to exclude potential amplicons that overlap the expected target.

param.name: var_selector
param.label: Would you like to include variants?

param.name: var
param.label: File listing variants to make in the reads
param.help: See "Variant file format" below for formatting information

param.name: pct
param.label: Percent of reads to make variants

tool.help:
This tool simulates paired-end reads. It uses the output from ipcress, which lists potential amplicons in a genome.
-----
**Options**
